name: AOS#Al-Suhail
flavor: Crucible variant. Glove discharge nodes have no pain inhibitors.

name: Apex Harmonic
flavor: The interwoven neuromotors are precise enough to pluck an atom from a molecule.

name: Astrolord Gloves
flavor: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

name: Aura Purge
flavor: Permit no distractions.

name: Axiom Coven
flavor: "Pray the bullets find you first. I will not leave a corpse for your Vandals to squabble over."

name: Azoth Bend
flavor: Warlocks can reshuffle a substance's atomic particles with a wave of their hands.

name: Barkhan Dune
flavor: "They say water once fell on Mars. Can you imagine it?"

name: Bindcaster
flavor: "To inflict your desires upon reality." —Toland, the Shattered

name: Blindsight Gloves
flavor: "With the sight I saw the self within the self." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Born Spark
flavor: Fabricated by your Ghost using nearby mass, this fieldweave handles life support and little else.

name: Chroma Vow
flavor: Feedback from a botched technique can cause agonizing burns. Fight through the pain.

name: Claws of Ahamkara
flavor: Look at all this life, oh bearer mine. There is so much left to burn...

name: Code Fire
flavor: Many Warlock techniques are channeled through the hands, so the gloves are a complex weave.

name: Cormorant Line
flavor: We spread our arms wide enough to envelop the world.

name: Dead Light Grips
flavor: At least we'll know we tried." —Arach Henri

name: Deathsinger's Grip
flavor: Grip the universe. Reshape it. Disregard the screams.

name: Desolate Gloves
flavor: More than shadows, but less than starstuff.

name: Dujiao Shou
flavor: "This world of ours is full of wonders." —Wen Jie

name: Dusk Tread
flavor: "It's not a proper learning experience if you don't dissect the body."

name: Eclipse Maw
flavor: "When he came back his gloves were still smoking. Of the Fallen, nothing remained."

name: Elector's Gloves
flavor: True power comes from the hands of the people.

name: Enigma Burn
flavor: Attune yourself to your fieldweave. A clean circuit should feel like a good night's rest.

name: Exodus Grips
flavor: We must make our own safety without the City.

name: Extropy Morph
flavor: Gravity is the weakest force, yet it chooses the shape of the universe. Thus, subtlety triumphs.

name: Fatekiller Grips
flavor: We must make our own safety without the City.

name: Gloves of No Tomorrow
flavor: Accept war as a fundamental process, not a transient condition.

name: Gloves of the Exile
flavor: "Strengthen the body, empower the mind." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Gloves of the Hezen Lords
flavor: "Capable gauntlets. Extremely effective. I have only one piece of advice: never touch a living Vex."

name: Gloves of the Seven
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Grasps of Ir
flavor: At the beginning, they stood in thrall of the Formless One, and they offered themselves to its depth.

name: Haliaetus
flavor: Crucible variant. The feathermesh pattern balances speed and strength.

name: Harrowed Grasps of Ir
flavor: At the beginning, they stood in thrall of the Formless One, and they offered themselves to its depth.

name: Heliopause Gloves
flavor: "We are not fatalists. We're optimists. We believe life exists beyond this dead orbit." —Arach Linde

name: Immanent War Gloves
flavor: Tomorrow will not be easily tamed.

name: Infinite Lines Gloves
flavor: "I saw three queens. No, two. No...just one." —RECORD 351-CHASM-6915

name: Iron Breed Gloves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Camelot Gloves
flavor: Forged in remembrance of Timur, he whom the City's enemies dreaded most.

name: Iron Companion Gloves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: Iron Regalia Gloves
flavor: Ornate armor forged by the Lords of Iron beneath the Iron Banner.

name: ISTANU-GNT Razor
flavor: I am an ISTANU-GNT VOLAR BATTLE GLOVE. Please disarm me in social situations.

name: Justicar's Gloves
flavor: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

name: Kallipolis Gloves
flavor: We cannot win the war beyond our walls without first winning the people within them.

name: Keeper's Gloves
flavor: "Prison is more than a cell. It is place of judgment." —Variks

name: Kellbreaker's Gloves
flavor: The gas is no soul. An ethereal lifeblood, maybe, but a soul? I think not.

name: Locus Watcher
flavor: "Your job on the fireteam is to see the patterns - and make them your own."

name: Logic Singer
flavor: The Warlock acts through the hands, because they are instruments familiar to the mind.

name: Manifold Seeker
flavor: Keep the left shoulder into the weather, especially if the weather includes bullets.

name: Monolith Bleed IV
flavor: "I can't shake hands with Warlocks. I just get so nervous they're going to vaporize me." - Pahanin Errata

name: Nemesis Plane
flavor: A Warlock understands the power of symbols. Treat a Hunter's cloak and a Titan's mark with respect.

name: Nerigal Savant
flavor: Stop thinking of the world as an outcome. Start thinking of it as a process.

name: Nothing Manacles
flavor: The equations balance thus: you are diminished, and I am exalted. You are broken, and I am made strong.

name: Ophidian Aspect
flavor: "Have I the aspic in my lips?"

name: Order's Gloves
flavor: A finger can be broken. A fist cannot.

name: Pariah Gloves
flavor: "They cast him out. But his words never left." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Queen's Guard Gloves
flavor: The hand of the throne.

name: Raven Sheath
flavor: Your very life is an act of defiance against Time - plucked from death to carry the fire.

name: Salicin Fen
flavor: "It wasn't until his fifth life that the Ahamkara spoke to him. By then it was too late." —The Five Lives of Albios

name: Samsara
flavor: "Perhaps I had lives even before that. Perhaps I was once a tree." —Wen Jie

name: Scalpel Wing
flavor: Gauntlet-mounted axion condensers help a Warlock's power shape reality.

name: Seraph
flavor: What do you think happened to us, before the Ghosts woke us up?"

name: Solo Clade
flavor: We are the last.

name: Spektar (All Types)
flavor: Armor infused with Chroma multi-channel heat sinks.

name: Sunbreakers
flavor: "When one can wield the fire of stars, what use is flesh and bone?"

name: Symmetry Fang VI
flavor: Theory is for the dead. In the Crucible, instinct reigns.

name: Talion Grace
flavor: "Your presence is imperfect. I cannot abide imperfection."

name: Tengu Operant
flavor: Any living thing is a causal subsystem of the universal whole. But the Warlock's subsystem has privileges.

name: Terra Bide
flavor: This one's ours.

name: The Impossible Machines
flavor: "The dead come for these, but the dead should not have them." —Crumpled note pinned in the clasp

name: Theosyion Vibrissae
flavor: Even in still air, Theosyion's tendrils continue to wave and twitch.

name: Thrallskin Brace
flavor: "Bet you killed a lot of Thrall to weave that thing. I didn't even know they had skin." - Omar Agah

name: Unity Clade
flavor: Each fingertip contains its own sensory cortex, as dense and rich as the tissue of the brain.

name: Vanth Orcus 0A0X
flavor: Crucible variant. Jormungand-coil fieldweave enhances peak rise.

name: Vector Oath
flavor: Warlocks learn marksmanship as quickly as anything else.

name: Viper Spine
flavor: A surgeon's hands - and all the laws of time and space a patient.

name: Watchers' Gloves
flavor: "The watcher does not just observe. The watcher defines the observed." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Winged Sun Gloves
flavor: "Those who fly beneath the Sun do not come back unscathed." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Temporis Floe IV
flavor: Consider the iceberg. To view it from above the water is to see only the smallest fraction.

name: Raku Izumi IV
flavor: Crucible variant. Quantum protons allow element shift based on a user's moment-to-moment needs.

name: High Command Gloves
flavor: Your deeds speak for themselves.

name: Eon Tracer Sleeves
flavor: "I can never find the beginning, the place where the path forks." —RECORD 448-CHASM-6808

name: Endling Gloves
flavor: We cannot let the lineage end with us.

name: Red Miasma Gloves
flavor: And how long do the effects of SIVA last? ~SIVA.MEM.CL006

name: Iron Saga Gloves
flavor: Thus armed were the Iron Lords of old, in the days after the Collapse.

name: Hadron Gale IV
flavor: Do not judge a storm by its size.

name: Days of Iron Gloves
flavor: "When the tainted grail o'erflowed again, who answered?" —The New-Forged Song

name: Cobra's Vigil Gloves
flavor: "Step forward, if you think you can challenge me." —Fractal Scrolls

name: Ophidian Aspect
flavor: "Have I the aspic in my lips?"

name: Gloves of Triumph
flavor: At last, the answers lie before you. Reach out. Take them.
